Content.summary: 'Fressen - No Pho' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about LONDON, food, chef, Hospitality Recreation written on 08 November 2006
Content.bodyText:
Visited: 01/11/2006

No Pho

http://www.viewlondon.co.uk/info_restaurant_maps_8727.html
3-4 Ludgate Broadway, The City, LONDON, EC4V 6DU

This place has the dubious honour of being the first to gain no rating and an active recommendation to stay away. Fressen is a city lunch venue that sells Beef 'Pho' (the only Vietnamese dish on their menu). All that we can say is that they obviously haven't sent their chef out to study how to make a real Pho and the end result is absolutely awful.

I've attempted to come up with a description, but there are so many criticisms. Just don't do it. The other food may be fine, who knows?

Good for: Nothing.
Bad for: Just Bad.
